attributes.action: Allow all London Taxis & Private Hire Vehicles to the London Road closures
attributes.additional_details:
These changes have not had a full consultation or giving Londoners the opportunity to debate. We live in a democracy, not a dictatorship. 
The Mayor of London is pushing these London Road Closures without the permission of Londoners which not only effects London but all of the U.K economy. 
All London Taxis should have the right to be included plus consideration to include London Private Hire Vehicle
attributes.background: Stop the Mayor of London going ahead with Road Closures if all London Taxis and Private Hire are not allowed to be included for access.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the Mayor of London, City Hall, and the Greater London Assembly, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could share your concerns with them using the contact details here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/contacting-city-hall-and-mayor.
